keyword: in n out double double calories
title: Calories in In-N-Out Double Double
meta_description: Learn the in n out double double calories: about 670 kcal per burger, with full nutrition facts on protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and variations.
assumptions: Standard Double Double burger with two beef patties, two cheese slices, bun, spread, lettuce, tomato, and onion; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and preparation; values based on official In-N-Out data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: An In-N-Out Double Double burger contains 670 calories and 37 g of protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Protein style (wrapped in lettuce, no bun)
Remove cheese (single patty implied, but adjusted for double without cheese)

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out Double Double?
faqs.a: 670 calories for the standard version with onion.

faqs.q: What is the protein in In-N-Out Double Double calories query?
faqs.a: About 37 g of protein per burger.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out Double Double calories high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1440 mg sodium due to the spread and cheese.

faqs.q: How do In-N-Out Double Double calories change without the bun?
faqs.a: Drops to about 360 kcal in protein style.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in In-N-Out Double Double?
faqs.a: 39 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 10 g sugars, mostly from the bun.
